G

game - Variable in class connect4.Player

Game - Class in connect4
Class that inherits Grid Class that contains game data, controls the game, and processes mouse event.
Game() - Constructor for class connect4.Game
Constructor that initializes variables
gameLevel - Variable in class connect4.CompPlayer
level of the game that the player has selected
GamePanel - Class in connect4
GamePanel that makes control panel and board panel
GamePanel(Game) - Constructor for class connect4.GamePanel
Constructor that makes board panel and control panel and also passes game status to them
getCol() - Method in class connect4.Location
returns y coordinate of the location
getColor() - Method in class connect4.Player
returns the color of the player's chip
getCurrentPlayer() - Method in class connect4.Game
returns the number of the player
getLevel() - Method in class connect4.CompPlayer

getName() - Method in class connect4.Player
returns the name of the player
getPlayer(int) - Method in class connect4.Game
returns the player of the given number
getPlayerLevel(int) - Method in class connect4.Game

getPlayNum() - Method in class connect4.Game
 
getPos(int, int) - Method in class connect4.BoardPanel

getRow() - Method in class connect4.Location
returns x coordinate of the location

2d array grid (x,y components)
Grid - Class in connect4
Stores game data and defines game operations that happen on the game board(not board panel)
Grid(int, int) - Constructor for class connect4.Grid
Constructor that creates 2d array grid with the size x x y
